title: CPU Implementation Feasibility Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly.
description: As an Apple soft-IP CPU Implementation Feasibility Engineer, you will be working for RTL feasibility, PD feasibility including tech/CAD work and PD methodology work.
preferred_qualifications: The ideal candidate will have implementation experience on high-performance CPU designs. Experience with Logical Equivalence checking (LEC) tools. Experience with Power analysis tools.
